General.Name: Lingkaran Trans Kota Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Lingkaran Trans Kota Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the design, construction, operation, management, and maintenance of Lebuhraya Damansara- Puchong and Western Kuala Lumpur Traffic Dispersal Scheme highway in Malaysia. The company operates toll plazas located at Penchala, Petaling Jaya, Puchong Barat, Puchong Selatan, Damansara, Pantai, and Bukit Kiara. It is also involved in the rental of software and related equipment. The company is based in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
General.Address: Kompleks Operasi Litrak, Petaling Jaya, Malaysia, 47500
